contents.alt: Minimap to find your way to the next step

contents.contents: Now cross the square and on your left, you will see the Maison du Terroir et de l’artisanat. Turn right into the “Rue de l’Ormerie”.  Go down the “Rue Jean-Desmarets and turn left into the “Rue de la Pie”. You should be able to see the Caesar Tower, your next stop.
Look at the imposing Caesar Tower.

choices: as a residence for the Count of Champagne
To impress and scare the enemy
To keep watch over the town

explanations.contents: Actually, it was built to assert the power of the lord of the domain.
